Description: Screw piles - galvanized helical piles installed (2.75-3.5 in shaft; helix below 2.0 m frost depth; 6-8 m typical)
Notes: Pile count assumes 60x100 ft PEMB perimeter columns at ~10-12 ft spacing; see ASM-001 and ASM-002

Description: Concrete grade beams connecting pile caps (strip footing rate as proxy for formed concrete beams)
Notes: Perimeter grade beam ~320 lf (97.5 m) = 2x100ft + 2x60ft; assumed ~80 lm net for pile-to-pile beams; see ASM-006

Description: Concrete slab-on-grade 150mm with W/W mesh - cold storage floor (60x100 ft = 557.4 m2)
Notes: Full concrete floor per DEC-002; includes sub-base prep; sulphate-resistant mix per REQ-07 (Type HS cement 32 MPa)

Description: Concrete aprons at overhead doors (2 doors x 16x16 ft = 2 x 23.8 m2 = 47.6 m2; 200mm reinforced for vehicle loads)
Notes: Heavy-duty 200mm slab for service vehicle loads per REQ-06 (OSR 10.3.10); 2 OH doors at 16x16 ft each

Description: Concrete aprons at person doors (2 doors x approx 1.5m x 2.0m = 6.0 m2; 150mm with mesh)
Notes: Smaller aprons at 2 person doors per REQ-06; standard 150mm slab adequate for pedestrian traffic

Description: Subgrade preparation - strip topsoil and compact per Geotech Report section 7.1 (557.4 m2 building footprint)
SourceRef: Assumed_Project_Parameters.csv PP-07 (6000 sf footprint) + Parametric_Building_Rates.csv PB-06 ($16/sf site dev rate prorated)
Notes: Includes stripping topsoil; scarifying; compacting to 98% SPDD; proof rolling; rate derived as fraction of PB-06 site rate; see ASM-007

Description: Granular base - 150mm radon rock below slab (557.4 m2 x 150mm depth)
SourceRef: Decision_Log.md DEC-EST-007 (derived from subgrade prep component of SC-03 rate)
Notes: 20 mm screened/washed rock per Geotech section 7.1 item 6; rate estimated from granular material supply + placement; see ASM-008

Description: Vapour barrier - polyethylene sheeting per CAN/CGSB-51.34-M below slab (557.4 m2)
SourceRef: Decision_Log.md DEC-EST-008 (derived rate for poly sheeting supply + install)
Notes: 6 mil minimum thickness assumed per REQ-08 [E-002]; includes laps and sealing

Description: Reinforcing steel for grade beams and slab edges (estimated 1500 kg for perimeter + slab mesh supplement)
Notes: Includes rebar for grade beams and supplemental reinforcing at slab edges/joints; W/W mesh included in SC-03 rate

Description: Anchor bolts - screw pile to grade beam connections (20 piles x 4 bolts = 80 bolts)
Notes: Standard anchor bolts set in concrete grade beams at pile cap locations; 4 per pile assumed
